surveyIntroduction: There are many things to consider in deciding what to do about safety in your relationship. Thinking about what is most important in your life can help you decide what is best for you. What is most important to one woman may not be important at all to another. On the next page we will ask you to weigh up which of the factors below might be most important to you.

surveySections.sectionIntroduction: Please rank the following from most important to you at the top to least important at the bottom

questions.questionText: Drag to arrange your priorities (Highest at the top)

params.responseString:
It seems like your feelings for your partner are what is most important to you right now. It can be difficult to accept that a person we love is hurting us. Your partner may need help with a variety of issues, however, it is important to remember that nobody deserves to be hit or abused. It might be helpful to assess the relationship to work out whether staying With your partner is the best thing for your health and wellbeing. A bit later, this website will provide:

  • strategies to help manage your feelings towards your partner
  • details of organisations who may be able to help your partner

It seems like staying safe is what is most important to you right now. Try to keep this in your mind when making decisions about your relationship. You can't control your partner's actions, but there are many things you can do to improve your safety. This applies if you decide to stay in the relationship, and also if you decide to leave. A bit later, this website will provide:

  • strategies to keep safe on the phone and when using the internet
  • tips to protect yourself at home and at work
  • advice on intervention/protection orders and safety plans.

It seems like having resources is what is most important to you right now. Being without money, housing, or a job can be very stressful, and worrying about this may affect the choices you make in your relationship. A bit later, this website will provide:

  • tips and resources to help with employment
  • information about protecting your finances and increasing savings
  • finding a safe place to live.

params.categoryName: Top Priority: My Health and Wellbeing
params.responseString:
It seems like your mental and physical wellbeing is what is most important to you right now. Relationship issues can take a huge toll on your health. It's important that you remember to take some time for yourself to help you to deal with what's going on. It can be very difficult to share personal problems with others, particularly if your upbringing or culture values privacy. However, even if it is hard, it can be good sometimes to talk with a person you trust and let them know what's going on at home. A bit later, this website will provide:

  • strategies for coping with stress and managing your feelings
  • links to some people you can talk to (confidentially) if you wish

It seems like your children's wellbeing is what is most important to you right now. As a mother, you want to protect your children and you want what's best for them. However, it is likely that your children may know about the issues at home, even if they have not seen it directly. This may be affecting them. Thinking about what's best for your children may help you make a decision about your relationship. A bit later, this website will provide:

  • strategies that may help you with parenting during this difficult time
  • strategies for managing safe contact if you separate and your partner has access to your children.

surveySections.sectionIntroduction: In this section we will ask about your intentions with your relationship with your partner or ex-partner. We understand that your feelings about what you would like to do may change, and that you might feel confused. It is best to answer about how you are feeling right now, even if this might be different in the future

questions.questionText: What are your intentions regarding your relationship?
selectionOptions: I intend to stay in the relationship
I intend to leave the relationship
I have already left the relationship
